commits.comment: Bug 42102: log4j 1.3 receivers for log4j 1.2
Bug 42102: Copy log4j 1.3 implementation to sandbox
Bug 42102: Change to reflective invocation of LoggingEvent.setProperty
Bug 42102: Make SocketNode inner class to avoid conflict with 1.2's implementation
Bug 42102: Forgot to copy SocketReceiver.java over from log4j 1.3
Bug 42102: Copy decoders from log4j 1.3, bump to require log4j 1.2.15
Bug 42102: Should be functional with current SVN log4j 1.2
Coping log4j trunk (1.3) version of LogFilePatternReceiver.java over to sandbox receiver area in readiness for combining with Chainsaw.
Coping log4j trunk (1.3) version of LogFilePatternReceiverBeanInfo.java over to sandbox receiver area in readiness for combining with Chainsaw.
* Fixed up LoggingEvent constructor usage to comply with log4j 1.2. * Changed pom.xml to reference expression-filter project due to the LogFilePatternRecevier dependency on Rule schtuff
Bug 42102: Add LICENSE and NOTICE to jar's META-INF
Final tidy up of addition of other receivers from log4j 1.3.
Bug 42102: Added site content and build.xml
Bug 42102: Remove ref for o.a.l.h.Constants, use javaee dependency to eliminate manual download, add test
Bug 42102: Fixed reports macro, CR to LF
Switching report macro to menu ref='reports'
Bug 42102: Fix build.xml copied from filters
Moving log4j companions out of sandbox
Bug 42102: Change version to 1.0, productization fixes
Bug 42102: Remove specification section from manifest in ant build
Bug 42102: Added missing parseUnrecElement's for DBAppender, UDP and MulticastAppender ports
Bug 42102: Add hsqldb dependency to build.xml, stale code in CustomSQLDBReceiver

Adds an option that determines whether a new thread, or the existing thread is used to import the events into the Receiver. By default the behaviour remains unchanged with a new Thread created to manage the import.
Added new property 'useCurrentThread' to the BeanInfo class for introspection purposes.
Bug 42102: Harmonization of companions
[maven-release-plugin] prepare release v1_0_rc1
[maven-release-plugin] prepare for next development iteration
Bug 42783: Remove companions that were rolled into extras
Bug 37930: web site staging to SVN repo
Bug 42102: Set mime-type on staged web content

- added logger.dtd to support processing of java.util.logging dtd-formatted events - added locationInfo support to multicastappender (note: no support for MDC or event properties in XMLLayout/1.2 log4j.dtd, so application/hostname properties won't be sent for udp/multicastappender)
Make LEVEL optional for logfilepatternreceiver (see http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=43075)
Adding sybase dialect (http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=42991)
Apply suggested fix to prevent NPE if generated keys supported.
Bug 41483: Add RewriteAppender and policies to replace MapFilter, etc
Prevent npe
Remove all Javadoc @since 1.3 references (1.3 is obsoleted) - see http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=43101
Bug 43131: Remove dummy: protocol from XMLDecoder
Bug 42102: Remove unnecessary dependency on jakarta-oro
Fix for issue http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=43140
Bug 42102: Restore jakarta-oro dependency
Added 'useCurrentThread' property to this receiver.  This is the same as the other Log-file based receiver.
Add javadoc for propertyrewritepolicy describing the name/value pair format For multicast/udp appenders, always set the hostname as a property
Removed unused 'overrideproperties' fields & methods in multicast/udp appenders
Eliminate need to resolve logger.dtd
- removed hostname property creation from socketappender - added hostname property creation to socketnode13 (used by socketreceiver) - made same change to xmlsocketnode (used by xmlsocketreceiver)
- Move helpers/Constants out of log4j and back to component - Remove reference to Constants from socketappender - Use Constants for hostname key in socketnode13
Bug 42102: Remove prospective release date and downloads from receivers
Adjust pom for log4j 1.2.15 release
Bug 43312: Mangled source-repository.html
Bug 41483: Use TreeMap for reproducable order in RewriteAppenderTest
Bug 43736 applied patch provided by Curt with extraction to a constant to indicate that XMLDecoder only deals with UTF-8 encoded log files.
Update ASL headers
Update JavaDocs to clarify receiver params
Update the customsqldbreceiver javadoc to make it even more clear that the user's db columns don't have to have the same name/contain all of the same columns (can be ALIASed).
changed logfilepatternreceiver parsing to use .*? and .* instead of .+? and .+
Bug 42171 Applied patch supplied by ray@ that resolves a bug where by duplicate events are received after a SocketHubReceiver is shutdown and then restartedi such as when used under Chainsaw.
Replace the dependency on the Sun Java JMS spec jar with the Geronimo one.  This aligns this module with the log4j main one.

Added two new parameters to LogFilePatternReceiver:  - waitmillis (configurable delay between checks for updates to a file - used when tailing=true)  - appendNonMatches (if true, append non-matching lines to the log, associated with the logger 'Unknown')
Fix for Bugzilla issue 47209: Color Filter rule level==info broken

Update LogFilePatternReceivers  - fix bugs in regular & VFS receiver's activateOptions & shutdown code to ensure the tailing thread is shut down when appropriate  - For VFS receiver, release the file during the sleep interval, allowing the file to be deleted/renamed during tailing if necessary

Chainsaw UI updates  - improve event load performance by holding off on tablemodel update notification until the entire batch is processed (50K+ events loaded in just a few seconds on a fast machine) VFS/LogFilePatternReceiver changes  - improve event parsing by assuming logger and level must not contain spaces  - rework logFormat parsing to beter support properties (when the property name contains part of a keyword name, or vice versa: PROP(TIME), PROP(LOGGER1), etc)
Commit patches provided by Antonio Petrelli - thanks Antonio
For a non-matching event when appendNonMatches=true, use the timestamp of the last matching event, to try to maintain time-based ordering even though we were unable to parse the event

modify xml decoders so additionalProperties override existing properties (allows, for example, the ability to load a set of saved events into a new tab in chainsaw, because chainsaw can modify the application/hostname properties that control event routing).
If level value couldn't be parsed as a known level, append that text to the message field
Added ZeroConf support to most of the network-based appenders and receivers.

Chainsaw updates  - It's now possible to directly load events stored in a zip file created when saving events to a file with a zip extension  - Now hiding the receivers panel by default  - Reduced the default size of the details pane  - Updated logpanel details, welcome tab and release notes panes to use system fonts and size

Chainsaw UI updates (feedback appreciated)  - instead of the default row selection rendering of changing the row's background color, the selected row color is preserved but a border around the selected row is displayed  - removed table row and column margin (border around cells in the selected row had gaps without making this change)  - updated widths of fields in status bar  - performance tweak: tree node selection no longer triggers unnecessary calculations (only currently displayed rows are recalculated for highlighting)  - removed bevel border around ID field
Fix case sensitive property loading issue in Chainsaw Fix bug in logFormat regexp creation logic in logfilepatternreceiver
Undo last regexp build change to logfilepatternreceiver (was correct)

added support for 'custom level definitions' in LogFilePatternReceiver, which allows the user to map strings in the log file to Log4j levels if there are extra spaces that would prevent a pattern from matching, strip them out exclude empty lines (if appendNonMatches was false, would add an empty line to the log)

Added ability to highlight search match text in the table (per-log panel preference, enabled by default)  - modified the Rule.evaluate method to accept a Map argument.  If the map argument is not null, the map will be populated with text matches resulting from the rule evaluation - the keys are the field names containing text matches discovered during rule evaluation, the values are the (possibly multiple) text matches - updated Chainsaw & receivers pom.xml to require log4j-extras 1.1 snapshot due to the change to the Rule API  - renamed JEditorPaneFormatter to JTextComponentFormatter  - modified the Search match color in the table from black background to grey background, from white foreground to black foreground - reworked concurrency & use of event lists in ChainsawCyclicBufferTableModel - added search matches to extendedloggingevent (used during rendering) - updated findnext/previous logic to handle no selected row, better handling of wrapping forward & back - reworked tablecellrenderer logic to support bolding of search-match text in the table (required changing multiline fields to use a jtextpane) - updated all Rules to accept a Map which is populated by String keys representing the fields providing a text match, and Set values containing the one or more text matches for that field (if the map is null, no collection of results is performed) - updated And, Or and Not rules to correctly aggregate text match results of their child rules - updated ExpressionRule to allow definition of expressions containing keywords as text (must be single-quoted)

Maven and build fixes to allow log4j, Chainsaw and companions (minus ZeroConf) to be built without requiring manual installation of any maven depdencies  - replaced log4j 1.2.16-SNAPSHOT references with log4j 1.2.16  - added java.net repository information to automatically provide javamail maven dependency (java.net repo provide javamail 1.4.3, so all javamail refs were updated to 1.4.3)  - added openejb maven dependency information to support javaee class dependencies  - updated 'version' property to 1.2.16  - removed zeroconf maven dependency from Chainsaw, added jmdns 1.0 maven dependency
Bug 42102: Missing source headers, pom.xml tweaks
Fix Bug 49421:  Chainsaw don't show Logger for SocketReceiver and SocketHubReceiver
Clarify configuration options on NoReceiversWarningPanel dialog
Added rat maven plugin support to chainsaw, component, extras, receivers and zeroconf
Bug 49078: javadoc.jar was missing NOTICE and LICENSE
Update receivers to set the 'active' member on activateoptions & shutdown
Updating meta char replacement to ensure all regexp characters are escaped properly

Some locales represent simpledateformatted-text with characters other than alpha/numeric (dot in French locales for the month)..use /S when building the pattern that can parse the timestamp format instead of /w to account for that situation
Support non-pattern characters in SimpleDateFormat (for example the T in  2010-08-12T13:58:50.729)

Minor bug fixes  - Fixed bug preventing non-blank receiver properties from being set to blank (except for 'name' field)  - Now only logging in VFS receiver panel if the file size grows or the file is truncated (not every time the file is examined for changes)  - Fixed bug causing a specified receiver configuration to be loaded twice if loaded from the receiver configuration/selection screen  - Updated LogFilePatternReceiver timestamp regexp support to escape dots in timestamps
Removed use of now-in-the-attic Jakarta ORO.  Now using java.util.regex package in LogFilePatternReceiver (java 1.4).  Also removed ORO from receivers pom.
Bug 43148: Add change notice for move to java.util.regex
depend to 1.1 stable, not snapshot
added poms to parent pom
upgraded to maven 3
maven logo for new branding
moved build plugin configuration to parent project
removed build targets from build file
cleaned up pom files, moved plugins to parent pom, formatting etc
completed branding requirements
Update relative path to companions parent
moved components to extras
